messages.message: Welcome to the party!  Please enter your name, and name your game!
Welcome to {GNAME}! Please enter your name!
Hi {PNAME}, thanks for joining {GNAME}, we're waiting for more players to join.
Hi {PNAME}, thanks for joinging {GNAME}, please wait for the next round.
{PNAME}, thanks for waiting, here we go!
{PNAME}, are you ready to play?
You're ready {PNAME}, tell everyone else to get their act together!
About time {PNAME}, the game's about to start!
OK {PNAME}, what do you want to write about?
Thanks {PNAME}, you voted for {PROMPT}.
Your prompt is {PROMPT} -- now write about it!
Awesome {PNAME}! You wrote: '{RESP}', guessing will start when everyone has submitted!
It's time to guess!
Alright, you guessed that {PNAME} wrote {RESP}.
Here is what's left...
Way to go {PNAME}, you won with {POINTS} points!
I like this game, another!
OK {PNAME}, we're sorry to see you to.
Welcome, give us some names!
Welcome to {PNAME} game!  Waiting for more players to join!
We've got enough, we'll start when everyone is ready!
Vote for your favorite!
So what do you think about this:
You wrote about "{PROMPT}"  Who said what?
Here are the results for this round... Your prompt was "{PROMPT}" --
Congratulations to
It's time to choose a prompt!
You've chosen your prompt...
The Players have spoken!
Round Results
you won with {POINTS}!!!
It's time for another round of guessing!
That's it for this round!  Onward and upward...
...to the end of the game?!?
...to a new round!
We're starting a fresh round, get ready to go!
You missed the mark a bit on these...
I'm impressed.
There were no wrong guesses, nice work!
You missed on this one.
{PNAME2} didn't write it.  Nice try {PNAME}.
Nailed it!
Well, this is disappointing.
There were no right guesses.  Try harder!
...{PNAME} wrote it...
...and {PNAME} guessed correctly!
...and {PNAME}.
That's worth {POINTS} points!
They'll split the points for {POINTS} points apiece!
Now for the unguessed players...
There were no unguessed players.
There were {PNAME} unguessed players, who each scored a {POINTS} point bonus!
{PNAME} was the only unguessed player and gets a {POINTS} point bonus!
